reuters.title: M.D.C. HOLDINGS <MDC> SELLS ENERGY UNIT
reuters.body: M.D.C. Holdings Inc said it sold substantially all the assets of its oil and gas unit, Mizel Petro Resources Inc, and affiliated partnerships, for 38 mln dlrs in cash to <Parker and Parsley Petroleum Co>, Midland, Texas. The company said that, subject to certain post-closing adjustments, it expects to post a small profit on the sale. Reuter 
